answers.answer: I have also had nipple sensitivity and that usually happens when i am on my cycle or about to start but they have been sensitive for about 2 weeks now...my lower back hurts once in awhile too...I have already have 2 kids 19 months apart and the reason I have had my tubes tied which they are clipped because of my preeclampsia I had with my youngest.  Please someone what do you think?

question: Okay....I have had two menstrual cycles..one on nov. 18 and ended on the 22 and all those days were light and then I had my cycle again on Dec. 2 or 3 and ended on the 7 and it was heavy and just stops cold....I have had some pregnancy symptoms since the 7th of december and recently I started to break out and having more saliva than normal. I have had my tubes tied (clipped) 9 months ago...I dont have a doctors appt. until the 9th of Jan. I am just curious what you might think it would possibly be.
title: What could this be? Please help
